```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(roll)
```




2,3,7,10,14,20


```{r}
 hlm_data %>% group_by(Team, slugSeason) %>% 
  mutate(lag_2 = lag(tot_deg_cent, 2), lag_3 = lag(tot_deg_cent,3), lag_7 = lag(tot_deg_cent, 7), lag_10 = lag(tot_deg_cent, 10), lag_14 = lag(tot_deg_cent, 14), lag_20 = lag(tot_deg_cent, 20), rollmean_2 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent,2), rollmean_3 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent, 3), rollmean_7 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent, 7), rollmean_10 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent, 10), rollmean_14 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent, 14), rollmean_20 = roll_mean(tot_deg_cent, 20), sd_2 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 2), sd_3 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 3), sd_7 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 7), sd_10 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 10), sd_14 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 14), sd_20 = roll_sd(tot_deg_cent, 20))
```
